Articles.Content:
Hello! I wanted to post my KD-88 jet, based on the McDonnell Douglas-88 (Which i flew on yesterday btw:D). It carries 68 kerbals, and also has realistically shaped wings. For anybody who downloads this, my challenge is to hide all the struts!

Download(.90):https://www.dropbox.com/s/3mxtn9gg31l4j1x/KD-88.craft?dl=0

Pictures!

Javascript is disabled. View full album
Edited January 3, 2015 by jceverett
Looks interesting. I'll give it a try.

http://i.imgur.com/6i5EvBh.jpg

Hello! I wanted to post my KD-88 jet, based on the McDonnell Douglas-88 (Which i flew on yesterday btw:D). It carries 68 kerbals, and also has realistically shaped wings. For anybody who downloads this, my challenge is to hide all the struts!

Download(.90):https://www.dropbox.com/s/3mxtn9gg31l4j1x/KD-88.craft?dl=0

Pictures!

http://imgur.com/a/MvUcN

Looks great! The wings are really impressive. I'll give it a try.

I've been playing kerbal for a little over a year now, the game is amazing and the people that play it are just as interesting. I've only recently started coming to the forums. seems like there are a lot of people out there that are just like me that have had the same trial and failures as I have. that's all that makes this a great game. you can come up with a concept and take it to an audience for help or just to share something cool you created. this plane looks great and I can tell you spent a fair ammount of time tweaking it to get it to actually fly. the last time I tried making a plane I got it into space achieved an orbit and then realized I didn't have enough mono propellant to get home. I leave that plane in space around Kerbin as a reminder. always have an escape plan. keep looking up.
